HERP.content: the voice, acc. Heidegger, is essentially marked, like everything at opening of Dasein, by Stimmung and Befindlichkeit—tonality, modality that is affective (not Heidegger’s words)
Heidegger’s voice is not an inner voice like in Husserl’s LI, but the voice of the other
voice of the friend (if originary) does not have to be friendly

POS.content: voice is consciousness itself when phonē is signifying substance > signifier and signified unite, signifier erases itself, exteriority of signifier reduced by spontaneous proximity
